title: I don't even know why we complain if Riot isn't gonna listen.
body:
Morde is less playable than pre-rework. 
Poppys ulti is a projectile?
Yasuo windwall, still probably one of the most complained about skills. 

The list goes on, but Rito only cares about money. They have only cared about money since late season 1 when they sold out to someone else.

replies.body: wanna know the last time riot listened to the boards? when everyone complained how weak darius and skarner updates were, we all know what happened when they went live and got buffed....

> [{quoted}](name=venomous frost,realm=EUW,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=Il2OJ5rR,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-12-05T17:59:03.948+0000)
>
> wanna know the last time riot listened to the boards? when everyone complained how weak darius and skarner updates were, we all know what happened when they went live and got buffed....

Honestly, the only reason they were nerfed, is because people don't like tanks thank can do anything other than stand there and die.

Mordes great, dunno what ur talking about

I hate the new poppy, looks weaker than original poppy cause no one knows how to play her 

Yasuo is pretty annoying but the wind wall is a 20 second cooldown

Riot listens. They pay a lot of attention to the boards. I reckon what you really mean is "Riot doesn't do what the loudest portion of the community says." Let's be real, neither the forums nor reddit are a good sample of League's player base, and the only people posting anything are those with opinions strong enough to bother. Riot is quite aware of what goes on in the boards, but they know the game better than any of us do, and if something needs changing, it'll be in the works.
